resources.string: Need Network Connection!\nConnect to network and try again!
Do you want to add comment?
Do you want to rate me?
Add comment below. This will be posted immediately if network is connected.
Give star ratings in ratingBar.This will be posted immediately if network is connected.
Do you want to read from saved database in your phone?

This app requires network connection for full functionality.\n Connect to network and restart the app to get updated details and posting comments/ratings!\n If you don\'t wish to connect you can Proceed but could only read previously saved Instructor details!
First Time User!!! \nConnect to network and restart the app!
The details of this instructor is not updated in your phone. To see latest details connect to network!
